feed.title: Undb Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Undb: v1.0.0-3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1845
  • feat: space by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1846
  • feat: space avatar tables by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1847
  • feat: verify email by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1848
  • feature/oauth by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1849
  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1851
  • Release version v1.0.0-3 by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-io/undb/pull/1852

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undb-io/undb/compare/v1.0.0-2...v1.0.0-3
